configuration.reqFieldMsg: Comment is required on completing configuration

label.placeholder: Write or drag and drop from metadata
label.formatError: Value does not have required format

metadataPanel.metadataWarning: There exists a newer version of metadata

help.metadata: Metadata is described in the incoming data and can be used to build the configuration of outgoing data

integrationForm.errorHeading: You must correct these errors, missing required fields:

help.sourceApplicationId: A source application is the source system that data to be processed in Flyt comes from
help.sourceApplicationIntegrationId: Reference/name/id of data to be processed in Flyt
help.destination: Where data is to be sent after transformation in Flyt

integrations.missingDataError: There is insufficient data to create a new configuration
integrations.errorMessage: There was an error fetching data, try again later.

help.header: List of integrations. Here you can see all the integrations and associated configurations, create new configurations for an integration or activate a configuration

dialog.body: Are you sure you want to activate this configuration?

instances.errorMessage: There was an error fetching data, try again later.

help.header: Overview of instances that have been received in Flyt, where each submission of data for one integration is an instance. The content of the instance is transformed and forwarded to the destination set in the integration

instances.FINT_FLYT_INSTANCE_GATEWAY_INSTANCE_REJE: Instance rejected with the following error message, '#message#'
instances.FINT_FLYT_MAPPING_SERVICE_CONFIGURATION_: No active configuration found for the integration
instances.FINT_FLYT_MAPPING_SERVICE_INSTANCE_FIELD: The instance is missing field with key='#instanceFieldKey#', which is required by the configuration
instances.FINT_FLYT_DISPATCH_GATEWAY_GENERAL_SYSTE: System error with the following error message: '#errorMessage#' - Contact FINT
instances.FINT_FLYT_DISPATCH_GATEWAY_INSTANCE_DISP: Instance rejected by destination with the following error message: '#errorMessage#'
instances.FINT_FLYT_DISPATCH_SERVICE_INSTANCE_DISP: Instance rejected by destination with the following error message: '#errorMessage#'
instances.FINT_FLYT_INSTANCE_GATEWAY_FILE_UPLOAD_E: Error uploading file, filename: '#name#' with media type: '#mediatype#'
instances.FINT_FLYT_MAPPING_SERVICE_VALUE_CONVERTI: Error during value conversion, cannot find key: '#valueConvertingKey#', in value conversion with ID: #valueConvertingId#
instances.FINT_FLYT_MAPPING_SERVICE_VALUE_CONVERTE: Error during value conversion, value conversion not found

support.descriptionBody: You can find a guide to using Fint Flyt

help.toggle: We are working on more ways to use value conversions in Flyt. For now it is as before and only custom value conversions are used
help.valueConverting: Value Conversion is a field that allows you to use a defined rule to convert each occurrence of a value. Value conversions are used in configurations in the same way as metadata and will apply to the field in question. It is not possible to edit an existing value conversion as this may affect existing configurations, but it is possible to create a new one based on an existing value conversion
help.valueConvertingName: Name of the value conversion to be created. Note that name is not required to be unique, but it is a good idea to give a descriptive name
help.from: Select the application where the value to be converted comes from, and what type of data it is to be converted from
help.to: Select the application the values that need conversion are to and the type they are to be converted to
help.convertingMap: Here you add conversions, press + to add more and - to remove
help.new: Here you can create a new value conversion. If you want to create a new one based on an earlier version, you can find it under actions in the table
